author: @pcdosgirl
text: Just saw you on the panel in THR video re Crowder, and I don't know if you're a survivor - or if you're educated and aware of how abuse works, but you killed it with your comments. I'm a survivor of abuse, had years of ptsd therapy and my cope is strong, but this Crowder shit has me triggered. I just want you to hear some validation for everything you felt and everything you said during this video. It's fricking textbook abuse and it would only escalate. When a woman is murdered by her husband, I guarantee it started EXACTLY like this! I learned too late to have zero tolerance, but I have it now, and I LOVE that young women like you get it! I'd keep going but I know I'm triggered, so I'll just say thank you (!) for expressing yourself, it has helped me tonight! üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª #following

author: @runewritten
text:
Ah, there you are!
So, I don't search for stuff to watch-- I let the algorithm rule my YT world. I've been watching the Leftist Mafia and keep wondering how/why the algorithm has shown me everyone else' vids dozens of times, plus a bunch of others in that sphere, but never Olay.
Well, I don't know what's changed, but you finally broke out of the algorithmic void with this vid. That's exciting
